control.description-key: PowerApps Component Framework control (PCF) that allows users to see records in a kanban view format.

property.name: filteredBusinessProcessFlows
property.description-key: Provide an array of strings with the business process flow names to filter out.

property.name: businessProcessFlowStepOrder
property.description-key: Provide a JSON array to control the order of business process flow stages (e.g. [{"id":"Develop","order":2}]).

property.name: hideViewBy
property.display-name-key: Hide View By if default View By set?

property.name: allowCardMove
property.description-key: When disabled, cards cannot be moved by drag and drop.

property.name: hideEmptyColumns
property.description-key: When enabled, columns that contain no cards are not shown.

property.name: hideColumnFieldOnCard
property.description-key: When enabled, the field used for column grouping (View By) is not displayed on the card to save space.

property.name: hiddenFieldsOnCard
property.description-key: Field logical names that are loaded but not displayed on cards. JSON array (e.g. ["field1","field2"]) or comma-separated list.

property.name: htmlFieldsOnCard
property.description-key: Field logical names whose content is rendered as HTML (not escaped). JSON array (e.g. ["field1","field2"]).

property.name: booleanFieldHighlights
property.description-key: JSON array: [{"logicalName":"fieldname","color":"#ff0000"}]. Cards get a colored top border when the boolean field is true. First matching option wins.

property.name: fieldWidthsOnCard
property.description-key: JSON array to set percentage width of fields on the card (e.g. [{"logicalName":"description","width":100},{"logicalName":"estimatedvalue","width":50}]). Width 100 = full width, 50 = half, etc. Fields not listed use default width.

property.name: expandBoardToFullWidth
property.description-key: When enabled, the board uses the full view width and columns scale proportionally.

property.name: allowCreateNew
property.display-name-key: Allow creating new records from board
property.description-key: When disabled, the add button on each column is hidden and new records cannot be created from the board.

property.name: notificationPosition
property.description-key: Choose the position where the toast message should appear
